post.text: Our jobs have been destroyed! I am about creating JOBS and nobody can do it like me. #MakeAmericaWorkAgain

comment.author: Nicholas
comment.text: Why would the beautiful Melania Trump, well educated, world traveled, speaks five languages and very proud of her husband and family and truly loves America want to steal anything from Michelle Obama, much less her speech.

replies.author: John
replies.text: because someone wrote it for her and did this- good for them. if she speaks five languages perhaps she should be able to write her next speech on her own.

replies.author: Autumn
replies.text: 'well educated'??? She failed out of college on her FIRST semester and never went back.

replies.author: Rachele
replies.text: Good questions. Also, why would she rip off a passage about personal integrity.
